name: Not Another Mimic
description:
NOTE: Main game loop is unfinished, still need to add chest difficulty randomization and loot tables.

This game is a submission for UAT Game Design Workshop Jam March 2023, Thank you for playing! 

The Game's Story

You are a dungeon chest appraiser who's job is to open up dungeon chest, but be careful they might be a mimic or trapped!

Controls and Instruction Guide

Game is controlled by buttons on screen using mouse to click.
